text:
Trustee Companies (Merger) Order 2003

I make the following order under section 12 of the Trustee Companies (Merger) Act 2001 .

25 March 2003

JUDY JACKSON

Attorney-General

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Trustee Companies (Merger) Order 2003 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Interpretation
    In this order, "Act" means the Trustee Companies Act 1953 .

4.
The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Trustee Companies Act 1953 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 2 April 2003

This order is administered in the Department of Justice and Industrial Relations.
